response.overview: The film tells the story of Saeeda, a married woman with a daughter, who works as an employee in a company and lives a quiet and happy life. Saeeda is kidnapped by a taxi driver who rapes her with his friend. For fear of scandal, she hides what she was exposed to from the police and from her husband, to whom she only tells that she was robbed.
response.title: سعيدة
